root.name: Sideway: New York
root.description: OverviewSideway: New York is an adventure platformer set in and around the "oh-so-gritty streets of New York City". The game was created by Playbrains in collaboration with Fuel Industries and W!ldbrain, and was released on PSN in October 2011 and on Steam the following November. The game's story chronicles the journey of tagger Nox, who is trapped in the flat, graffiti-based world of Sideway. Nox must fight across the walls of New York in order to rescue his friends from the clutches of the evil Spray and make his escape back to the real world.PC System RequirementsOS: WinXP SP3 (32-bit only), Vista SP2, 7Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3Ghz or greaterMemory: 1 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 2GBVideo Card: 256 MB Video Memory with Shader 3.0 support; ATI Radeon X850XT / NVIDEA GeForce 7600GTDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c or greaterSound: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible Audio Device
